thread.section_title: Hotel Edouard 7 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Hotel Edouard 7, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Frank B
title: Perfect location
text:
As u know you are spoiled for choice when it come to hotels in Paris stop searching and just book here
It's in a great area with everything on your doorstep and very safe
Staff are great ideal location
Comfortable beds with all mod cons
We had a room with a double balcony which added to the Parisian feel of the hotel
Only thing I could suggest is more options for room service
We are returning in the summer and would definitely return here
